verses.name: Luke 23:9
verses.text: Then he questioned with him in many words; but he answered him nothing.

verses.name: Luke 23:10
verses.text: And the chief priests and scribes stood and vehemently accused him.

verses.name: Luke 23:11
verses.text: And Herod with his men of war set him at nought, and mocked him, and arrayed him in a gorgeous robe, and sent him again to Pilate.

verses.name: Luke 23:12
verses.text: And the same day Pilate and Herod were made friends together: for before they were at enmity between themselves.

verses.name: Luke 23:13
verses.text: And Pilate, when he had called together the chief priests and the rulers and the people,
